title: Mobile-Based Design-Based Research (DBR) for Enhancing English Speaking Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and fundamental digital device operation proficiency
context.additional_context: Aims to provide personalized feedback and collaborative learning opportunities in large-class settings. Implements real-time recording/sharing and peer evaluation systems via mobile applications

learning_goals: Learners achieve TOEIC Speaking Test Level 5 or above (7-8 score points) within six months
In weekly project-based presentations, learners attain 80% or higher fluency scores when delivering 10+ minute English presentations
Learners achieve 3.5 or higher on a 4-point scale in peer feedback writing ability assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
